recommendations: Jean Majid ‚ÄúIt is my distinct pleasure to write this recommendation for Prashannt, a dynamic and strategic business consultant with a razor-sharp acumen in the realm of marketing. In short, Prashannt's expertise, creativity, and commitment make him an invaluable asset to any entrepreneur or business seeking to navigate the often-turbulent waters of startup development. I have no doubt that he will continue to drive remarkable results wherever his path may lead him. Throughout my professional journey with Prashannt, he has consistently impressed me with his entrepreneurial spirit, boundless creativity, and relentless productivity. Prashannt's deep understanding of business mechanics, paired with his mastery of marketing strategies, has been instrumental in driving the success of numerous startup projects we've collaborated on. Prashannt has an innate ability to conceptualize, develop, and implement game-changing strategies that have consistently led to growth and success. His out-of-the-box thinking combined with his pragmatic approach to problem-solving has often been the difference between mediocrity and excellence. His commitment to his clients is unparalleled. He is not merely a consultant but a trusted partner who is genuinely invested in their success. This is evident in the solid relationships he has built and the broad network he has amassed over the years. But perhaps Prashannt's most commendable attribute is the warmth and respect with which he treats everyone he works with. His interpersonal skills are as impressive as his business acumen, making him an absolute joy to work with.‚Äù

Riju Tibriwalla ‚ÄúPrashant is a good human being with a clean heart and the very important thing - emotional quotient. He is a great listener and a good orator as well. He values other's time and effort and his problem solving skills befits a lot of people. Life is a great teacher and Prashant is a good student!‚Äù
